mapper.select: SELECT ctg.*, COUNT(pd_no) AS pd_count FROM prod_ctg ctg INNER JOIN prod ON ctg.pct_no = prod.pct_no GROUP BY ctg.pct_no, pct_name ORDER BY 1 ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_color (pcl_no, pcl_name, pcl_code) VALUES (prod_color_seq.nextval, #{pcl_name}, #{pcl_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE prod_color SET pcl_name = #{pcl_name}, pcl_code = #{pcl_code} WHERE pcl_no = #{pcl_no}
